1570456755_1DXjRGbVDrJjUQd4ZzmFF1vvQUvqs.body:
Though there is truth in what you said about humanity not acting human at all, I'd encourage you to stand up, do the best you can and try to do better. Try to convince people close to you to join you and just change the world a little bit for the better.

Quote from Cloud Atlas:
“My life amounts to no more than one drop in a limitless ocean. Yet what is any ocean, but a multitude of drops?”

2_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj.body: Any ideas where to see the "ZeroTalk Newsfeed" if you follow a talk?
OK, it's on your ZeroHello Dashboard like main page. At first it was just too crowded as automatically all ner ZeroTalk posts appeared in there.
